What's up!

I've gone by many names online, but you can call me fish. I never know how to talk about myself, but I can at least say I enjoy drawing, playing music, and petting dogs. I've been on the internet for a long time, though I stopped interacting with social media once algorithims began limiting the value of creative expression and extensive communication. Luckily, I stumbled across the concept of personal websites and turned this site into a fun lil project as a way to put myself out there again!

ABOUT THE SITE

This site was originally made to primarily archive my art, but I was promptly inspired to create a kajillion more pages after browsing the other sites on this domain. I also just liked the idea of having my own little customizable space where I can unbashedly talk about whatever has latched onto my brain at the moment.... (right now it's spiderman sos bro) Currently it's pretty bare bones as I am very new to coding, but I hope to expand on it and have a place that feels like me :--D

Fun Facts

- i am afraid of needles, but only when someone is attempting to inject one in me

- i love the smell of new rubber and a doctor's office

- i have permanently broken my front tooth bc i ate shit going down a hill when skating once (was tryna assert dominance over my brother but in the end i was the fool)

- my favorite genres are horror and romcoms! even better when it's both..

- i am kind of allergic to everything (curse of being too goated)
